summary: The test suite validates the core functionality of the faster‑whisper speech‑recognition library. It includes helpers for locating test assets, checks the tokenizer’s handling of Unicode and suppression rules, exercises transcription features such as batch processing, empty audio handling, hot‑word boosting, timestamp generation, multilingual transcription, speaker diarization, language detection, and voice‑activity detection, and verifies utility routines for model listing, downloading, and caching.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the faster‑whisper library’s speech‑to‑text capabilities across diverse scenarios, ensuring high‑quality transcription, proper model management, and robust handling of edge cases for end‑users and downstream applications.
